metadata.description: "Worlds" features three standalone comic book stories from the talented mind of Gary Scott Beatty. Contained within you will find the tale of the world’s very first genetically created immortal; the story of a vampire’s questioning desire between life and love; and a uniquely presented murder mystery set in a 50’s jazz club. So be prepared to be entertained with art by James Lyle (Grimm Fairy Tales) and Bill Bryan (OZ, Dark OZ).
metadata.name: Worlds
